The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

meme2meme

Usage:

meme2meme [options] [<motif file>]+

Description

Convert and merge multiple MEME formatted files into a single file in minimal MEME format.

Input

<motif file>+

The names of one or more files containing MEME formatted motifs.

Output

Options

Option Parameter Description Default Behavior
Input/Output
-consensus Numeric motif names are replaced with a consensus sequence based on the motif. The original names are used.
-forceurl MEME motifs may already have URLs embedded but this option causes them to be replaced by the URL passed to -url. Existing URLs are kept.
